about_the_game:
The third wave of Little Witch Nobeta SKIN DLC is here! It features a fierce dragon princess outfit and a classic schoolgirl-style uniform, as well as trendy landmine-style clothing.
From hairstyles to weapons, the designs are full of creativity, allowing Nobeta to put on dragon-armored battle robes or wield a staff shaped like an automatic pencil or an umbrella and battles against the Soul Dolls!

The set is unlocked without any conditions; once purchased and downloaded, you can use it in the game.
